mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.module_name, m.module_no FROM usemodule um JOIN module m ON um.module_no = m.module_no WHERE um.contract_no IN ( SELECT c.contract_no FROM contract c WHERE c.contract_state = '계약중' AND c.company_code = #{companyCode} )

SELECT sm.sub_module_name AS subModuleName, sm.url_pattern AS urlPattern, sm.module_no AS moduleNo FROM sub_module sm WHERE sm.module_no IN (SELECT DISTINCT um.module_no FROM usemodule um) ORDER BY sm.module_no ASC
